name: Hello Benny - Horror Machine
description:
Terrible things are happening in this monstrous place! You were hired here to prevent some serious incidents… but then everything went out of control! You must work for five days and night according to your contract, so you have no choice – be attentive and careful to avoid the real beasts of Hello Benny - Horror Machine game!

Everything is so unreal – cruel monsters, horrifying atmosphere, something terrible behind the darkness… And you’re just poor little guard whose aim is nothing but to survive the five long nights! Watch your minimap to exactly know where the beast can go right in that moment – this device is really helpful in such terrific situation!

Each second in this house is generously rewarded with some points, so just be calm, quiet and attentive not to be caught by something extraterrestrial or just monstrous! Use your self-preservation instinct to be ok longer and you’ll be generously rewarded with some useful boosters like invulnerability, invisibility or speed-up! Play this amazing Hello Benny - Horror Machine game and have fun!

Tap the right places of your screen to move, use the minimap to prevent some accidents and unlock several boosters! Don’t let the real bunch of despair absorbs you! You should be really careful and extremely attentive not to meet the actual horror of this place!

Hello Benny - Horror Machine features:
• Nice horror game filled with monsters
• Interesting boosters to ease the gameplay
• Just five night to survive
• Amazing monsters as the main evils
• Colorful surroundings made in 3D

Check this fantastic Hello Benny - Horror Machine game – you won’t be disappointed!
